storyInfo:
As soon as Ch'en and Lin enter the arms store, the interior suffers an explosion, drawing surprise from the audience and presenter.
In the rubble, after coolly talking it over, the two dispel the crisis.

attributes.content: What now? LUNG wRATh have hit a government-issued ambush blockade.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: In all the frenzy, Ernesto's decided to take up the rear, and the two heroines have caught his key and left to press forward.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Ernesto's combat strength might be as impressive, but with this many enemies, his defeat could only be a matter of time anyway!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: But as for the heroines, they've broken out of the entrapment, but ambushes still lie ahead! Can they really get away without a hitch?
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Oh? They've opened a door on the street and rushed inside!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: This store...
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Is one of Ernesto's.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: So that's their game! Looks like the key Ernesto left them works for sheltering in a shop of his.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: But is this truly going to work out?
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Hold on! Director, switch cameras!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Alright, that's the REAL game! From another angle it all makes sense. This store has a back door.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: And we can see, there's a passage from that door through to the main street, and it hasn't been discovered by any other team's interference!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Is this LUNG wRATh's chance, or is itâ€”
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: The words are still on D.D.D.'s lips when, there on the screen, the sound of a tremendous explosion comes from Ernesto's arms store.
Whâ€”Wh-Wh-What in the world is going on here?
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Lady Candela, is that an obstacle you installed as well?
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: If it was, it wouldn't be as basic as blowing up this one single shop.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: This... could it be that another team knew Ernesto had this up his sleeve, and laid a trap?!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: If so, then we can say LUNG wRATh has been completely and utterly outdone!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: LUNG wRATh, is this what buries you?!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Wow... Miss Ch'en and Miss Lin will be okay, won't they?
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Relax, they've both been around the block. A little explosion like that's not gonna get them.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That said... this competition's no stranger to dirty play, but this one's a little too targeted.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Wonder if Ch'en's got beef with someone here.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Grrr... what the hell's with this guy? I can't even hit him.
attributes.name: Ambush A

attributes.content: Uh... I think that's the way Miss Ch'en's bunch went.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Let's go take a look and see.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Hui-chieh, are you dead?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough*. Like that would kill me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You're alive. Good. Your bike?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Gone.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yours?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Perfectly fine.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: It seems our opposition didn't want us dead and buried either.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: As luck would have it, the exit is blocked.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Well, good for luck.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Your view?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: We find a way out. What else?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What I'm asking is who did it.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Looks like our intuition was on the mark.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Right. Ernesto couldn't hold it in, I'm guessing.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: But don't you think it's odd? If I were him, this isn't how I'd do it.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Only one at the end of his rope would use such self-destructive means.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Maybe, it wasn't actually him.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Impossible.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Maybe, he wants us to think he's desperate.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Lin YÃ¼hsia raises her eyebrows, and leaves it be.
Right. Have you told Lady Candela about the matter?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: How did she respond?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: You won't do anything... will you?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's right, my girl. You're a smart one. You should be able to figure it out.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: If I sent someone to inspect the bombs now, wouldn't that just be telling the mastermind I've noticed their schemes?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No matter, Ch'en. You and Lin have done very well already.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: To be frank, at the start I had no expectations you'd find anything at all, hahaha.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: And you don't seem to care?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Of course, my girl.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: And you needn't worry about this too much.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I've seen you and Lin put on a very good show in the championship. Why not forget all this, and try your very hardest for number one? You'll put a smile on Wei Yenwu's face too, hahaha.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: We'll take it into consideration.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You can probably imagine it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Easily.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Now, how do we get out?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I heard a certain Special Inspection Unit Chief could dice apart a whole building in her rage. Mind showing me first-hand?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Not every building's so sliceable. This one's clearly built from exceptionally sturdy stuff.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Can you use your sand ability to transport things?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm not my dad. A blockage of this level, with my ability, would need some time.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Then I'll have a go.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No need. I have another method.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Can you guess what this is?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: ...A bomb?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Do you remember the bomb from the first round?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: There was no way Lady Candela could conduct a wide search, but I had a few of the boys here dress up as thieves and enter the neighborhood to steal as many as they could.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Thieves?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Thieves. So long as they gave the guards a bribe, and didn't make too much noise inside, no one would care about them.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Lin YÃ¼hsia.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: You might be unalike, but I have always deeply respected you and Mr. Lin.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The slums couldn't go on without you, I know that much.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Don't let me catch you enjoying yourself.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hui-chieh... nobody would ever assign themselves blame of their own accord.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Out of the way. I'm going to set the bomb.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia
